description:
The battle for Wakayama castle continues!  Muagi battles Saizou while the rest of the Magistrate`s fights the last of the crucifix insects, and Jinbei attacks Yukimura.  The Magistrate plunges herself into the Eternal Well, and her mysterious past is revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 蟲奉行 呪われし過去
